meanings.definition: Kinkajous: small, nocturnal, tree-dwelling mammals native to Central and South America.
meanings.sent1: The kinkajous were spotted climbing trees in the dark forest.
meanings.sent2: I learned about kinkajous in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The kinkajous had a party in the treetops last night!
meanings.sent4: The kinkajous moved through the trees like shadows.
meanings.sent5: The kinkajous' eyes glowed in the moonlight as they searched for food.

meanings.definition: Kinkajous: plural form of kinkajou, referring to more than one of these animals.
meanings.sent1: We saw a group of kinkajous playing in the trees.
meanings.sent2: The zoo had a special exhibit featuring kinkajous.
meanings.sent3: The kinkajous chattered happily as they swung from branch to branch.
meanings.sent4: The kinkajous' presence in the forest added a sense of mystery.
meanings.sent5: The kinkajous' playful antics entertained the visitors at the sanctuary.
